body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Patrick Jones, and I'm from ABC Car Dealership. May I have the pleasure of knowing your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Abigail. Before we proceed, could you please provide me with your phone number? I need it for our records.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is eight six five zero two one four three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Abigail. One more thing, could you kindly share with me your email address for communication purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is a b i g a i l @ y a h o o . c o m.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Abigail. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Abigail. Thank you for contacting us. Have a great day!
